comments.en:
Multi-function device (printer/copier/scanner/fax).

For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status, maintenance features, scanning and photo card unload use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

The printing engine of this device is the same as in the monochrome DeskJet 520 printer, so printing will work with various drivers.

This printer has a 600x300-dpi-REt mode which is probably not accessable with free software.

Stand-alone copying should just work, it does not need the PC.

Consumables/Refills: Black ink cartridge 51626A
